product_name: Anon M1 Painted Snow Goggles - Women's
long_description: The women's Anon M1 Painted snow goggles boast a magnet-based interchangeable lens system so that you can easily change up your lenses to meet the conditions of the day. Pink SQ lens has a rose tint and 35% visible light transmission (VLT) to reduce eye fatigue while enhancing contrast and depth perception in flat light. Green Solex lens has a dark bronze tint, 18% VLT and a multilayer green mirror finish to cut glare and reduce eye fatigue in very sunny conditions. Both options include a spare Blue Lagoon lens, which has a high-contrast yellow tint, 68% VLT and a mirror finish to enhance definition and contrast in low light. Interchangeable lens design embeds magnets in the frame and lens, making it a simple process to swap lenses without taking the goggle frame off your face. To swap lenses, simply pull the lens out, switch it and snap the new one in-the magnets automatically guide and hold lens in position. Large spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Antifog treatment and full-perimeter venting combat lens fogging. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Tough thermoplastic polyurethane frame offers consistent flexibility in changing temperatures for a comfortable, secure fit. Strap outriggers hinge to create a flush fit that minimizes gaps and distributes pressure evenly across your face. The helmet-compatible design of the women's Anon M1 Painted goggles fits medium-size faces; goggles come with a protective nylon case and microfiber storage bag.
short_description: The women's Anon M1 Painted snow goggles boast a magnet-based interchangeable lens system so that you can easily change up your lenses to meet the conditions of the day.
